content: Singaporean leisure and entertainment groupThis article **does not cite any sources**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Cathay Organisation" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(October 2025)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Cathay Organisation Holdings Limited** is one of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)'s leading leisure and entertainment groups. It operates the first [THX](/wiki/THX) cinema hall and digital cinema in Singapore. The group has operations in both Singapore and [Malaysia](/wiki/Malaysia). ## Current Subsidiaries - Cathay-Keris Films Pte Ltd - Cathay Cineleisure International Pte Ltd - Cathay Properties Pte Ltd - Cathay Consultancy Services Pte Ltd - Cathay Ed-Ventures Pte. Ltd - Cathay Leisure Holdings Pte. Ltd. - Cathay Hospitality Pte Ltd ## Past Subsidiaries - Cathay Ad-house Pte Ltd - [Cathay Cineplexes Pte Ltd](/wiki/Cathay_Cineplexes) - Hangout Hotels International Pte Ltd ## Hangout Hotels International Hangout Hotels was a budget hotel chain operated by Cathay Organisation.[*citation needed*] - [List of cinemas in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_cinemas_in_Singapore) - [Golden Village](/wiki/Golden_Village) - [Shaw Theatres](/wiki/Shaw_Organisation) - [WE Cinemas](/wiki/Eng_Wah_Global) - Official Website
title: Cathay Organisation
